templates.title: Simplicité - Test
templates.description: Simplicité platform with no persistence (restart = clean slate). Pre-installed with Demo and SimFeatures modules.

templates.title: Simplicité - AI
templates.description: Simplicité platform with no persistence (restart = clean slate). Pre-installed with Demo, AI & SimFeatures modules.

templates.title: Simplicité - HSQLDB
templates.description: Simplicité platform using embedded HSQLDB database (with volume persistence). Pre-installed with Demo module.

templates.title: Simplicité - PostgreSQL
templates.description: Simplicité platform using PostgreSQL database in dedicated container (with volume persistence). Pre-installed with Demo module.

templates.title: Simplicité - MySQL
templates.description: Simplicité platform using MySQL database in dedicated container (with volume persistence). Pre-installed with Demo module.
